name: outlaws assassin : western justice
summary: Outlaws Assassin is a Wild West VR shooter blending strategy, stealth, and intense gunfights. Navigate desert towns and saloon showdowns. Upgrade weapons, track enemies with a unique mirror mechanic, and take on diverse missions. Save girls (hostages), rescue friends, take down bosses, and assassinate the devil executioner. Every move counts in the untamed frontier. Become the ultimate gunslinger and face outlaws, bandits, and sheriffs. Currently, it has 30 levels but more levels are on the way.
